entry.title: New release for VoucherVault: v1.8.0
entry.content:
[!TIP] This release provides new environment variables SESSION_EXPIRE_AT_BROWSER_CLOSE and SESSION_COOKIE_AGE. These can be used to adjust the lifetime of session cookies.

Furthermore, there is a new environment variable OIDC_AUTOLOGIN to automatically trigger an OIDC flow on the login page.

See Wiki > Environment Variables

Features

  • support oidc autologin (8ef1462)
